name: Luminous Realms (Pre-Alpha)
description:
/////////////////////////////////////////
This project is still in early development and will keep updating as time goes on.
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

Since I was a kid, I have been a huge fan of Kingdom Hearts. A game combining my two favorite things, Disney and Final Fantasy, was my perfect game. 
It combined Mario 64’s agile 3D platforming mechanics with Final Fantasy’s deep JRPG mechanics for an incredible gameplay experience.

Having grown up playing games like Kingdom Hearts, I have always wanted to create a colorful and exciting game like it.

So I’ve decided to finally create my dream game, Luminous Realms, which is heavily inspired by Kingdom Hearts and other games and stories I’ve encountered throughout my life.
